summary: Makes Shadows Deeper, and Boosts Color and Enhances Vibrancy of outdoor Lighting and Effects.
descriptionHtml:
[b] Immersive Saturation Boost [/b]
[i]By Aplestormy[/i] 

[b] Features [/b]
[list]
 [*] No Performance Loss
 [*] Almost doubles game saturation, getting rid of the \\\"Washed out\\\" visuals
 [*] Compatible with [i] nearly [/i] every Lighting Mod
 [*] Makes Colours brighter, and more vibrant
 [*] Doesn\\\'t change interior lighting
 [*] Enhances Vibrancy of outdoor Lighting and Effects
[/list]

[b] Compatibility [/b]
This mod is compatible with all lighting mods that do not directly change Skyrims
imagespaces. 
[list]
 [*] 100% Compatible and recommended with RCRN 
 [*] 100% Compatible with ENB\'s
 [*] 100% Compatible with Realistic Lighting Overhaul 
 [*] 100% Compatible with Climates Of Tamriel (DOES NOT CHANGE NEW IMAGESPACES, ADDED BY CoT)
 [*] [b] NOT COMPATIBLE WITH IMMERSIVE CONTRAST BOOST, PICK ONE! [/b]
[/list]

[b] Notes [/b]
The saturation change may appear extreme at first, to lessen the effect, [b] raise
your brightness [/b] to fit personal preference.
This mod is not to everyones taste, if you don\\\'t like the effect, don\\\'t download!

[b] PUT AT THE BOTTOM OF YOUR LOAD ORDER! [/b]

[b] Mods Used In Screenshots [/b]
[list]
 [*] RCRN Classic
 [*] Towns and Villages Enhanced: Riverwood Redux (Not released)
 [*] WATER
 [*] Moss Rocks
 [*] Bigger Trees
[/list]

[b] Links [/b]
[list]
 [*] [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=128490856] Steam Download [/url]
 [*] [url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=79384336] Towns and Villages Enhanced [/url]
 [*] [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=128339847] Immersive Contrast Boost [/url]
[/list]

Please remember to like and favourite!
author: Aplestormy
